channel.title: C4 Architecture Diagrams on Dynamic Simulation Environment
channel.description: Recent content in C4 Architecture Diagrams on Dynamic Simulation Environment

item.description: Copyright 2023 Robert Bosch GmbH SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 Structurizr Lite Webserver # View at: http://localhost:8080/workspace/diagrams#SystemContext # DSE rendering. $ make lite # FSIL redering. $ WORKSPACE=fsil_workspace make lite # Stop the web server $ make stop Generate Diagrams $ make generate $ make clean
